hero.title: ‘If we can’t fish any more, we’re going to die’: the volunteer sea patrols protecting precious Philippine waters
hero.description: Dedicated groups called Bantay Dagat aim to conserve the abundant marine life surrounding their thousands of islands, which has been under pressure for years from intensive overfishing

primary.title: Philippine and Chinese vessels collide in disputed South China Sea and 4 Filipino crew are injured
primary.description: The long-simmering territorial disputes in the South China Sea are expected to be discussed at a summit of leaders of the Association of Southeast Asian Nations in Melbourne.

secondary.title: Video China’s coast guard caused collision at sea, Philippines says
secondary.description: The Philippines accused China's coast guard of carrying out "dangerous manoeuvres" that led to a collision between its coast guard ship and a Chinese vessel in the South China Sea.

secondary.title: 2 PH ships damaged, 4 crewmen injured: China fires water cannons anew
secondary.description: Two Philippine vessels were damaged and four Navy men were injured yesterday as China harassed anew a rotation and reprovisioning mission at Ayungin Shoal

secondary.title: Actions speak louder than words
secondary.description: The recent incident involving China Coast Guard ships and one of our supply boats is yet again another example of the disgraceful, dangerous and aggressive behavior that shows China's propensity to doublespeak.

carousel.title: 2 Filipino sailors killed, 2 severely hurt in Houthi missile attack
carousel.description: Manila, Philippines — Two Filipinos have been killed while two were severely injured following a missile strike on a cargo vessel off Yemen, the Department of Migrant Workers (DMW)

carousel.title: ‘Why is that funny?’: Flustered Marcos laughs when asked about family’s plunder
carousel.description: On Australian television, Marcos downplays as propaganda the PCGG's findings about his family's ill-gotten wealth, even though this is well-documented

carousel.title: Rising teenage pregnancies a concern
carousel.description: As more young women in the region are entering motherhood at an early age, the Commission on Population and Development (CPD) is urging local government units to establish their own local adolescents and teen centers

carousel.title: With ‘no chance for justice’ in the Philippines, drug war families eye ICC
carousel.description: Ferdinand Marcos Jr has shown little interest in helping families find justice, as drug war killings continue.
